Tabu searchÔÉÅ

solution.metaheuristic.tabusearch.easyTabuSearch(initial_solution: solution.cvrp.solution.SolutionCvrp, multiphase: bool = True, neighborhood_function_list: Union[List[str], str] = ['closestInsertionNeighbours', 'routeSwapNeighbours'], function_iteration_list: List[int] = [3, 9], number_iteration: int = - 1, tabu_length: int = - 1, aspiration: bool = True, max_second_run: int = 45, publish_topic: str = 'solution_stream') → List[solution.cvrp.solution.SolutionCvrp]ÔÉÅ

tabuSearch()

Function to run tabu search

Parameters

  • initial_solution (SolutionCvrp) ‚Äì The initial solution

  • multiphase (bool) ‚Äì Boolean to know if the tabu search need to have multiple phase

  • neighborhood_function_list (List of function) ‚Äì List of functions to find neighbours

  • function_iteration_list (List of int) ‚Äì Number of iteration to do for each function

  • number_iteration (int) ‚Äì Number of iteration to do

  • tabu_length (int) ‚Äì Length of tabu list

  • aspiration (bool) ‚Äì If the aspirate criteria is enabled or not (ignore the tabu list if it upgrade the solution)

  • max_second_run (int) ‚Äì Maximum second to run tabu search

  • publish_topic (str) ‚Äì topic name where to publish the solution

Returns

An improved solution with all the historical solution found

Return type

TabuSearch

solution.metaheuristic.tabusearch.tabuSearch()ÔÉÅ

Function to run tabu search

Parameters

  • initial_solution (SolutionCvrp) ‚Äì The initial solution

  • multiphase (bool) ‚Äì Boolean to know if the tabu search need to have multiple phase

  • neighborhood_function_list (List of function) ‚Äì List of functions to find neighbours

  • function_iteration_list (List of int) ‚Äì Number of iteration to do for each function

  • number_iteration (int) ‚Äì Number of iteration to do

  • tabu_length (int) ‚Äì Length of tabu list

  • aspiration (bool) ‚Äì If the aspirate criteria is enabled or not (ignore the tabu list if it upgrade the solution)

  • max_second_run (int) ‚Äì Maximum second to run tabu search

  • publish_topic (str) ‚Äì topic name where to publish the solution

Returns

An improved solution with all the historical solution found
